1211212121212221112211112211211112222112.content:
"Oh alright then," you eventually said, figuring you'd swapped about enough already that one more swap wasn't going to hurt (even if it was with your mom).

"Excellent. Then let's give it a whirl shall we?" your mother replied, clearly delighted by your decision, "It'll be fun to experience life as my daughter's best friend for a while." You heard a quiet little snicker from Anne as she said this, which she of course quickly tried to hide, obviously finding your mom's ignorance as to who exactly she would be swapping with pretty funny. You could certainly see the funny side yourself (as well as the slightly weird side - having tried to swap with your mom earlier out of sheer desperation, but this time it being completely different), but you knew that if your mom found out it was you in there and not Jenny, there's no way in hell she would; no doubt being mortified at the very thought of her 14 year old son getting free reign of her body. So, giving Anne a sharp elbow to the ribs to remind her to keep quiet, you did your best to remain as composed as possible as your mom then climbed into one of the pods.

"This is gonna be so cool," Jenny whispered to you as you made your way towards the other one, being almost as clueless as your mom was, "You're gonna be your own mom...my mom now! Just think of the fun we'll be able to have with you as a grown up."

"Yeah, it's going to be awesome," you replied with a lack of real enthusiasm, you mind more focused on how strange it was going to be, rather than how fun, as you then clambered inside the pod and watched the door shut behind you.

"You ready, Jenny?" your mother's voice asked a few seconds later, to which you replied, "As I'll ever be..." before pressing the button on her side and bringing the body swapping machine to life. Just as before, you felt the surrounding metal begin to vibrate and a heard a loud drone in your ears, which was quickly and abruptly cut short as a blinding flash of light obscured your vision and signaled that the process was completed.

Already, just lying there in the metal pod, you could tell that this one was a lot different from the previous two swaps, your body suddenly feeling a lot bigger and heavier than it had before, a lot of that new weight seemingly located on your chest as you felt your now adult breasts pressing down against your chest. "How do you guys feel?" Jenny excitedly asked as the doors then opened and the two of you climbed back out.

"Amazing!" your mother beamed, your former face lighting up as she enthusiastically examined her new body, before turning and looking towards, "I can't believe it really worked...that I'm now you!"

"Me neither," you agreed, flicking a stray strand of long blond hair out of your face as your vision returned, suddenly getting a birds eye view of your mom's large boobs pushing out prominently from her top.

"How does it feel to be me?"

"Really freaking weird..." you wanted to say as you pulled your eyes from your new cleavage and briefly examined your now much wider hips and ass, feeling more than a little creeped out if you were being entirely honest, but not really wanting to say that in front of your mom, aware that you were still supposed to be in character as Jenny. "Feels really...awesome," you instead replied, trying to sound as though you meant it, which once again elicited a brief chuckle from your sister, Anne.

Checking herself out a little more, clearly over the moon to be young again, your mom then announced that it was time for her and "Anne" to go have some fun, and after giving you a few words of encouragement to assist you in your transition, she then grabbed what she thought was her daughter by the hand and led her back up the stairs and out of the basement, giggling excitedly about all the things she'd was going to get the chance to do all over again. This left you and your former sister (now son) alone together again, and looking over at her clearly very amused face, you took a chance and asked, "Any chance you wanna swap now?"

"Uh-uh," she said, shaking her head rather smugly at you, "Sorry, but I'm happy right where I am, mom." And with that she too left, giggling away to herself as she went, leaving you alone to face the awkwardness and embarrassment of being stuck inside your own mother's body.

So, rubbing your hands gleefully at the prospect of all the things you'd now be able to do, trying not to think too much about the less enjoyable aspects of being your 45 year old mother, you then exited the basement, following after Anne and the rest of them to go see exactly what they were now doing.

Glancing down at your mother's watch you saw that it was just after four, which meant you still had about two hours before dinner (which somehow you got the impression you'd be expected to cook), and seeing as usually your Sunday's were mostly spent lounging around on the sofa watching TV, which your little sister was now taking care of, you really weren't sure what you were supposed to do. "What the hell does mom do with herself all day?" you asked yourself, only ever really seeing her doing chores when she wasn't at work, which was something you really rather wanted to avoid. For a moment you considered going upstairs and actually asking her, but then you remembered again that it was your house now, so you could do anything you liked. You could kick your "son" off the sofa and order him up to his room if you really wanted to, freeing up the TV for yourself. You could even go and take the car out for a spin, it technically now belonging to you (though to be honest, you'd most likely crashing it seeing as you hadn't the slightest idea how to drive). "Alright!" Says Jenny. She turns towards Kate, only to find out that she's gone. "Eh? Where's my body?" She asks, turning around to see her body sneaking towards the door.

Kate becomes nervous realizing she's been caught and rushes out the door, trying to escape Jenny. However Kate has not been in Jennie's body very long, and runs awkwardly, making her slow. The long stride, slight chest, and difference in height are slowing her down. Jenny on the other hand has had more practice moving in your body, and easily catches up to her, dragging her back to the machine.
"No, I don't want to be a little girl again." Screams Kate, as she struggles to break free from Jenny's grip. Jenny holds on tightly though and begins to push her into the machine!
"No!" continues Kate.

Something unexpected happens though, as

A.) Kate manages to escape Jenny's grasp, and pushes her in the pod before stealing your body, leaving Jenny as herself, and you trapped as Kate.

B.) Jenny manages to lock Kate inside the pod, but tells you that she doesn't want to swap back until Kate leaves, so you can switch back without her interruption, and possible meddling.
15111212112211212212222112.title: She agrees to help you

choices: Kate's mother collects you and takes you home
You try to tell Kate's mother the truth
151112121122112122122221121.content:
You gasp out in horror as Kate pushes Jenny in the pod. You then have no choice but to watch as Kate swaps with Jenny, stealing your body, and putting Jenny back in her own.

Kate exits the pod, in your body, laughing "Ha! I'm so much stronger than either of you now. There's no way you can make me be a little girl again!"

Jenny then also exits the pod, looking even sadder than you, at losing the male body she loved so much. "Please Kate, this is wrong. You can't just steal other people's bodies" she says, trying to convince her, but Kate just doesn't listen.

"I'm bigger than you now, you can't tell me what to do!" she says, grinning. You are about to respond, when you hear a shout...

"Kate! Your mother's here!"
151112121122112122122221121.title: Kate is now Jack, Jenny is herself.

choices: Stay as Kate for now. This soothing feeling won't go away
Ask Jenny or Kate's mother to swap with you in the meantime.
1511121211221121221222211212.content:
Oh no, it's not supposed to end like this. If you don't swap back now you'll be stuck as Kate for who knows how long.

"Kate!" Calls the mother as she approaches closer. "Where are you?" She asks.

"Oh she's probably downstairs in the basement hiding again." Says your mother as you become overly worried about what's going to happen to you.

You try to hide behind a couple of boxes but before you can do so Kate's mother appears. "Come on sweetie, it's time to go home for now." Says the woman.

You turn around towards the woman, and actually think she's rather attractive. Kate was actually her first child, so she's not as old compared to your mother. Her long flowing black hair fell down to her back, as she wore a green blouse and jeans which hugged her body nicely. She was somewhat of a petite woman with a totally average, and yet beautiful body. Her expression was intense and yet calm, and you felt as though she was naturally this way. "It's time to go home now Kate." She tells you as she grabs your hand ready to head home. You feel yourself calm down a little, feeling as though this situation really isn't as bad as it seems. Kate's mother's warm hands seem to soothe you and make you feel calm in a way you had not before.

But, you still wanted to get back to your body at the same time. "Wait!" you call out to Kate's mom. "I'm not who I look like. I'm actually Jack." You tell her. "That machine over there, it's a body swapping machine, and your daughter well she stole my body." You say, pointing towards the machine and hoping she'll believe you.

"Alright." She says.

"Wait, you believe me? That's it?"

"Why would I not believe you? You are telling the truth right." She asks.

"I am."

"Then..."

"Well, could you please just have her swap back with me?" You ask her kindly.

"Alright." She says as she walks towards your old body.

"Come on Kate, it's time for you to become yourself again. We're having pizza for dinner tonight remember?"

"I don't want to swap back yet." Says Kate. "I want to be an older kid, and now that I'm Jack, I don't want to swap back, at least not today."

"Then it's settled, we can always have you two swap back later."

"Huh?" You ask confused. "You're not going to make her swap back with me?"

"Well, I haven't forgotten about you at all Jack." Stooping down to your level she smiles at you. "Do you think you could handle being my daughter for a day? Or maybe Jenny over there will allow you to swap with her." (Kate's mom knows Jenny's parents) "Or, if you don't want to be a little kid, you could always be me for a little bit." She says, with that same calming air around her.

You mull over your choices. Being Kate would be kind of weird, but at the same time her mother seems to have a weird kind of effect on you. Almost like it's soothing your entire psyche. Calming you down so deeply that you can just forget about your troubles. If she's around you probably wouldn't mind staying as Kate for a bit. You've never really felt so relaxed in such a short time.

On the other hand, you've been used to being Jenny quite a bit, and if she was up for it you don't think you'd have any problem being her. However you also felt like if you stayed as her any longer you might develop more of her memories, and you really really would have to make it up to her at some point by putting her in Kate's body.

Lastly there was Kate's mother. She was average, and yet amazingly attractive with an intense calm feeling that seemed to emanate out from her. You don't think it would be horrible, but at the same time you really didn't know much about being an adult. Though, one day really didn't seem all that bad, and the thought of being in such a peaceful state really was something you would like. Who knows, if she's making you feel like this. You kind of wondered what she felt like, and this would be a great chance.

You finally decide to...
1511121211221121221222211212.title: The Truth comes out?

choices: Something happens during the car journey
15111212112211212212222112121.content:
After thinking about it for a while, you decide to remain as Kate for now. "I think I'll stay like this, but just for today." you tell her mother.

Jenny seems shocked by your choice, but the mother just smiles and nods. "Alright then. Well, I suppose I had better get you home." She reaches down to you, and you take her hand as you walk out of the house. "Be good while you're here Kate" she tells her real daughter, as you two leave.

Your own mother doesn't seem to notice anything has happened as Kate's mother thanks her for watching Kate and says goodbye.
15111212112211212212222112121.title: Stay as Kate for now.

choices: Ask her to turn the car around so you can both swap.
151112121122112122122221121212.content:
You leave your house and hop into Kate's car. Were you really doing this? Were you really okay with being a six years old girl?

"So, Jack was it?" Asks Kate's mom. "How does it feel to be young again, and a girl?"

You don't quite know how to respond to this and shyly tell her that it's alright, but a little weird.

"Oh, I'm sure it is. Well don't worry, this will only last a day, and then you can swap back." She tells you in a sweet voice.

You stay quiet for a moment, wondering how she can be so accepting and calm about this. I mean if you weren't in this situation, you wouldn't have believed anyone could switch bodies. "Umm... Katies mother?" You ask.

"Call me mommy while you're in that body sweety." She tells you.

"Umm, mommy, why are you so accepting of this? I mean I'm a boy in your daughter's body, wouldn't you like to know the real Kate was with you at home instead? And why would you even want to swap with me? I'm a boy, and-" You're cut off before you can finish speaking.

"If it was a stranger I wouldn't be so happy about it. but, since I know you and consider you a trustworthy person, I believe it's fine. Besides, this only makes my day more interesting right? Also it's not really fair that Kate stole your body, and I know that. I just thought that if you didn't want to be Kate, you might be more open to being me. Wouldn't you find it nice to be an adult for a day?" Kate's mom says, chuckling a little bit to herself.

"Well, what if I didn't want to switch back?" You asked her.

"Then I'd wait until you wanted to switch back."

"And if that time never came?"

Kate's mom pauses for a moment, before finally responding. "Well I don't think it would be a bad thing to start my life over again. But I'd want you to come over and tell me how Kate is doing every now and then."

You're shocked, is she just crazy, or just that accepting of things?

You're really curious about her now, and almost feel like asking her to swap just to see if you can look through her memories and find out why she's like this way. You also really want to feel how she feels. That calm air she exudes must mean being her is just a dream. Besides, even if your personality started changing into hers, you would still be open to swapping, as she is. Really, she was a prime candidate when it came to swapping with anyone, as you knew for a fact, you would be okay with switching back, because she's okay with switching.
151112121122112122122221121212.title: Something happens during the car journey

1511121211221121221222211212121.content:
Once you reached home, you felt your body getting weak and a yawn escaped from your mouth.

"It seems that it's Kate's bed time", Kate's mom tells you, "don't forget to change to your nightgown."

You were to sleepy to do anything, "alright mommy", you then walk toward Kate's room and without much thinking you change into your nightgown.
1511121211221121221222211212121.title: You finally get home.

choices: Someone else gets in the other pod instead
1511121211221121221222211212122.content:
"Okay, I've changed my mind. I'd like to try being you for a bit." you tell her.

She smiles at this, and seems very pleased by it, as she turns the car around. On the drive back, you wonder what being an adult, and a woman will be like. So far you have only been rather young girls, and so have no clue what a mature woman's body is like at all. You also hope to look into her memories and find out why she's so accepting of these things and why she seemingly wants to be a teenage boy.

Eventually, you arrive back at your real house, and head down into the basement (Kate's mother tells your mother that you had forgotten something here.)

The real Kate, and Jenny are still in the basement. From what you heard as you walked in, it seemed that Jenny had been trying unsuccessfully to get Kate to swap with her, so she would have your male body again.

Kate's mother explains why the two of you are back, and you step into the pod, ready to swap...
1511121211221121221222211212122.title: Ask her to turn the car around so you can both ...

choices: Play a game with your "daughter" to pass the time.
15111212112211212212222112121221.content:
You hop into the pod and wait for a moment as the machine slowly starts to activate, it's gears whirring with excitement. You close your eyes, and suddenly feel a weight on your chest. You open your eyes and look down to see that you are now wearing a green blouse with jeans. You now confirm that you are in fact Kate's mother. Success!

As you step out of the pod a sensation unlike anything you've ever felt before hits you. It's almost like you're in a haze, and at the same time you can see with crystal clarity. You don't even know how to describe it. It's not joy, or stupidity, or even naivety and gullibility. No, it's just something else entirely. Going a step beyond serenity. You're not even sure what to think at this point. The second pod door opens and you look down to see Kate's mother in Kate's body. "Hi mommy." She says jokingly, as she moves over towards you.

You stoop down to her level and smile. "Let's go home." Throughout all of this, you feel amazing. You've only been in her body a few moments and already her personality has had this effect on you. You wonder what you'll feel if you let it progress even more.

Thanking your mother for letting you back into the house you head into the car and drive back home. Normally you'd be to scared to drive a car all by yourself while in someone else's body. But in this body you have no anxiety, and with Kate's mother's pointers, you easily make it back home.

On the way you learn a little bit about Kate's mother. She's a single mother living on her own with her daughter. She also works at a highly successful office where she sells car insurance.

When you finally get home you try to think of what to do next. Well you really wanted to look into Kate's mother's memories, but it still wasn't time yet. You would probably be able to see them tomorrow morning, especially when you're groggy from waking up.

You look at Kate's mother, and see that she seems to be in awe at how large the world is to her now. Maybe you could play a fun game with her as mother and daughter should.

Just then another thought comes into your mind. You could try to play a joke on her, and tell her you've decided you don't ever want to swap back again. However it was kind of mean, and you didn't really want to upset her. Though at the same time, even as a child she still seemed to be peaceful, unlike the rambunctious body she inhabited. You might be able to give her a good laugh.
15111212112211212212222112121221.title: At home.

choices: Listen in on the phone call she's making
Go to Kate's mothers room and have a proper look at your new body
151112121122112122122221121212212.content:
You decide to go with playing the joke. You approach her and say to her "I think I like it in this body. I'm not going to swap back ever now."

To your surprise she just nods and says "Okay then. I actually really wanted a chance to start over, and Kate likes your body, so this way everyone is happy." with a smile on her face.

You were not expecting this at all and decide to quickly put a stop to the joke, so as not to get her hopes up "Um, I was actually joking, sorry about that. I do want to go back to my body." For a second, her face has an extremely angry look on it, but she quickly changes back to a calm expression.

"I see. Well, I think I'm going to go to my room now" she says, taking a phone, and heading up to Kate's room. You feel a little guilty, and hope you haven't upset her too much, after how kind she was to you.

What do you decide to do now?
151112121122112122122221121212212.title: Joke around a bit

1511121211221121221222211212122121.content:
Feeling bad about how you lied to Kate's mom you decide to go after her upstairs and to Kate's room. As you approach her you hear her talking to someone on the phone. "So, the machine is destroyed completely, and can't be put back together, right, Jack?" You pause for a moment, and feel slightly uncomfortable. You know you should feel worse, but Kate's mother's body was keeping you composed during this dire situation. You walk into the room and ask her what's going on. In response she sticks out her tongue, and holds out the phone to you, showing that it's been off the entire time. "I was just joking." She says, laughing.

You sigh, "So you're not mad then?" You ask.

"No, I knew right from the get go you were just kidding, that angry face I put on was just to scare you." She says.

You laugh a little bit to at the whole thing. You should have known that Kate's mother was to controlled to actually do something like that. Sitting down on the bed next to her, you decide to ask her something. "You're a really nice person you know that?" Kate's mother looks at you smiling slightly from the compliment. "So, what I guess I'm trying to ask is, whether or not you'd be open to doing this again in the future."

Kate's mother nods her head. "Of course, whenever you feel like you need a break, just ask me alright? Oh and by the way, my name is Clarissa."

Clarissa huh? That's a beautiful name.

At this point you decide that spending a full day with Clarissa would be pretty fun, but at the same time you also want to thank her for being so kind. Maybe you could do a few chores around the house to give her a well deserved break.
1511121211221121221222211212122121.title: Listen in on the phone call she's making

choices: Nothing happens until you go to bed
You get a phone call from Clarissa's ex-husband (Kate's father)
15111212112211212212222112121221212.content:
You decide that you will do some work around the house, as a way to thank her for being so kind to you. You go to find the hoover and begin to hoover up the floors. This should be a little difficult for you, as in your own body you never helped with any work around the house, but it seems that in this body you know what to do, and manage to do a pretty good job of it around the whole house.

You then get the ironing board out and begin to iron a pile of clothes. After you are done with this, it is quite late, and Clarissa informs you that this is when they would normally have dinner.

You go out to the kitchen, and find that Clarissa's cooking skills are with you in this body, as you manage to prepare a nice meal for the two of you. After this, you spend the rest of the evening watching television with her, and talking with her.

She goes to bed at Kate's usual bedtime (8:30), leaving you on your own for a while...
15111212112211212212222112121221212.title: Do some chores.

choices: She has always been like this.
You can't quite look into her memories just yet. Everything is a little fuzzy.
151112121122112122122221121212212121.content:
You stay up a little longer watching some television, before realizing it's starting to get late. Luckily today is a friday and Clarissa doesn't work on weekends. That means you can stay home and hang out with Clarissa for a bit, before returning back to your house to swap into your original body again. You get up from the couch and turn off the television, heading into your room. You strip down, taking off everything but the bra and panties so as not to intrude on her privacy. You put on a long sleeve button shirt, but before buttoning it up you look at yourself in the mirror. Clarissa's red bra and panties can be seen through the unbuttoned white shirt. You feel like this would normally turn you on, but the calming affect her body feels stops you entirely. You don't even really feel like doing anything. You prepare to go to sleep as you button up the shirt. Looking into the mirror one last time you can't help but smile. Clarissa was average in looks, and yet she was beautiful. You weren't sure how to describe it. Just one night's sleep and you'd finally be able to look into her memories, or so you theorized. Turning off the lights you hop into bed. "I don't think it'd be horrible if I stayed like this." You mumble to yourself, as you slowly drift off to sleep.

Waking up in the morning you feel refreshed. You've never slept that well before in your life, it's practically unreal. All of a sudden you remember you can try to find out why she's like this. You try to look into her memories and discover...
151112121122112122122221121212212121.title: Morning!

choices: While out with Clarissa, you become able to look into her memories more clearly
You don't, but still enjoy spending time with her before it's time to swap back.
1511121211221121221222211212122121212.content:
As you are trying to look into them, you get some brief flashes of her memories, but not enough to really find out anything. You sigh, disappointed, as you are swapping back soon and at this rate might not be able to see them before that happens.

You get dressed for the day, and head downstairs to make breakfast for yourself and Clarissa, who is not awake yet. She wakes up by the time you are finished.

"Good morning mommy" she says to you.

"Good morning, we have a little time before we all switch back, want to go out and do something?" you ask.

"Yes, I think that would be enjoyable" she replies, and after you eat breakfast, you head out, wondering if her memories will become more clear to you during this.
1511121211221121221222211212122121212.title: You can't quite look into her memories

choices: Tell Clarissa nothing happened, and head back home.
15111212112211212212222112121221212121.content:
You and Clarissa spend the day shopping for clothes together, and while this isn't something you would normally do, you feel really calm and are happy to see Clarissa in Kate's body happy. After buying Kate's body a dress you both exit the store ready to go home to prepare to swap back.

"I had a lot of fun today Kate." You tell Clarissa with your new soothing voice.

"I had a lot of fun too mommy." She replies giggling. You smiled a little bit at that.

"Come on, let's head home and then get ready to swap back." As you put the dress in the trunk of the car you walk around towards the front seat, before suddenly feeling a sharp pain in your head. You put your hand over your head as you wonder what exactly is going on. Suddenly images appear in front of you, that of who you assume to be is Clarissa's ex husband. The images play out as Clarissa is trying to get her husband to calm down. He enters an angry rage and punches Clarissa in the head, knocking her out. Pulling out a knife he walks over towards her menacingly, but before he can kill her, the cops bust down the front door and order him to drop his weapon while pointing their guns at him. He complies and is immediately arrested before Clarissa passes out. Waking up in a hospital a friendly neighbor and Kate watches over her intently as Clarissa slowly wakes up. As it turns out the neighbor heard a commotion and called the cops, saving Clarissa and her daughter's life. The images stop, and you try to remember why her husband got angry, but you can't seem to remember anything. But looking back, even further, you can't ever recall Clarissa being calm before that event. Touching your forehead where Clarissa's ex-husband hit you, you figure that the wound he gave her body, somehow managed to stop her from worrying, or something to that extent. You look over towards Clarissa in Kate's body, you never thought about it, but even now the mental changes haven't affected her in the slightest. Wait...

Ever since you were in Clarissa's body, you really haven't felt many strong emotions, none really. Was Clarissa just putting on an act this whole time? Of how she would normally react? Did she really lose most of her emotions. As you look at her Clarissa stares back at you. "Are you okay?" She asks.

Emotion starts to well up in your chest, as the emotionless body of Clarissa fights against them.

The emotions are too strong, and overpower Clarissa's emotionless body. You begin to cry for Clarissa and her plight.

OR

Clarissa's body manages to get rid of your emotions, you only feel a little sympathy.
15111212112211212212222112121221212121.title: Emotional Rollercoaster

choices: On the way back, you ask Clarissa about what it's like to live with her problem
Nothing happens on the way back
151112121122112122122221121212212121211.content:
Despite the body fighting against it, your emotions manage to overpower it, and force their way out. You hug Clarissa, while you cry, and tell her what you saw in her memories. She hugs you back and tries to comfort you. It was a strange sight for people around you, a little girl comforting a crying adult.

You do calm down after a while though, and it is about time to go to your house and swap everyone back to their rightful bodies.
151112121122112122122221121212212121211.title: Hug Clarissa and cry.

1511121211221121221222211212122121212111.content:
You ask Clarissa what it's like for her to live with her problem. She responds telling you that while she never gets worked over anything, she has to force herself to smile, and for that reason alone she feels like she's not a good mother. She tells you that Kate knows her emotions aren't real, and for that reason Kate has distanced herself from her.

"I'm sorry to hear about that." You tell her.

"It's alright." She says plainly.

"Have you been feeling any emotions since you became Kate? " You ask her, wondering if the mental changes have been effecting her at all.

She tells you that yes she has, but only a little bit. From this you realize that the normal mental changes aren't effecting Clarissa very much, and it would probably take a week or two for her to fully regain her emotions. But maybe you could switch with her until then...
Despite being in Clarissa's body, your own emotions seemed to combat the emotions of the body, so you figured Clarissa could regain her old emotions, and then she'd at least be able to be herself, even if it was only halfway.

You think about it for a while before realizing it's time to go. You'll have to think about it in the car then. As you drive you still can't come to a conclusion and soon enough you're back at your house. You stop the car and Clarissa reaches out towards the door, ready to hop out but you stop her by locking it before she can open it.

"Is something wrong?" She asks you.

You decide to tell her...

A.) "Let's fake swapping back, I want you to be able to have emotions again, and this way we won't freak out Kate or Jenny."

B.) "I had a lot of fun Clarissa, but I really think it's time for us to swap back to normal now. You were a really great daughter."
1511121211221121221222211212122121212111.title: On the way back, you ask Clarissa about what it...

choices: Jenny and the real Kate notice
1511121211221121221222211212122121212111.content:
"Let's fake swapping back, I want you to be able to have emotions again, and this way we won't freak out Kate or Jenny." you offer to her.

"Really? You would do that for me, just so I could possibly have emotions again?" she says, not quite able to believe it.

"Of course." you reply. "You are a great person and I really want you to be happy."

She gives you a hug, and thanks you, as you go into the basement, ready to fake the switch.
1511121211221121221222211212122121212111.title: Fake a switch

choices: Jenny wants to switch with Clarissa to become you again
Your mother invites you and Kate to stay for dinner.
1511121211221121221222211212122121212111.content:
Entering your house you enter the living room to see Jenny and Kate. Jenny still seems to be asking Kate to swap, but Kate isn't having any of it. Jenny notices both you and Clarissa enter however, and smiles.

"So I guess it's time for you, Kate, and Kate's mother to swap back now." She asks.

You nod your head as you all enter the basement. While you said you were going to fake the switch, you're not really sure just how to go about it. First things first however, as you watch Kate and Clarissa enter the pods. They both activate the machine and in a short matter of seconds are done switching. Kate exits first, a bit annoyed, but otherwise just fine. Clarissa then exits the pods in your body, a almost emotionless expression on her face. She walks up to you and grabs your hand.

"Ready, Kate's mother?" She says, somewhat calmly.

You smile. "Of course." as you follow Clarissa up closer to the machine. You enter a pod, and Clarissa does the same. Alright then, how can we cause the machine to run, without swapping us you think to yourself. Hmm... you look around the pod a little bit, but can't seem to find anything other than the button. However, as you examine the pod wall you notice a small indent and put one of your fingernails in it, pulling at it until the latch pops off. A hidden panel? You look at the panel and see a single button with a small note under it.

Reading the note it says "False swap."

Alright, well maybe this is just what you're looking for then. You put your dainty finger up to the button and press it, watching as the machine whirs to life before dying down. However nothing has happened, you didn't swap at all. Closing the panel you hold a finger up to your lip. The creator of this machine must have put in this button just to take over someone's life. You felt a little bit grossed out by the prospect of stealing someone else's life without permission, but at the same time you were happy this was a feature of the machine, otherwise there was no way you'd have been able to falsely swap without altering the machine in some way, which would not be a good idea as you weren't even sure you'd be able to fix it again.

You exit the pod, trying to keep up your composure so you don't give anything away.

Clarissa on the other hand, exits the pod, and starts over dramatically hugging your body, telling herself that it's so great she finally got her body back. You're a bit surprised at first, but then realize that Clarissa has been able to fake a lot of emotions when around other people. This must be really easy for her to do.

You take in a deep breath, feeling your breasts slowly rise before falling once more. For the next week or so, this body was yours. You didn't want to switch back until Clarissa finally gained her emotions again. However as you're about to head back home with Kate something you didn't expect happens.
1511121211221121221222211212122121212111.title: A hidden panel?

1511121211221121221222211212122121212111.content:
Just as you are leaving with Kate, you hear the two of them talking behind you.

"So, Jack, since you said you'd make it up to me, can we please just be each other? I promise it will work out for the best for both of us." you hear Jenny saying. You assume Clarissa will refuse, after all, she wouldn't agree to give someone else your body.

You see her pretend to think about it for a moment and then respond with...
1511121211221121221222211212122121212111.title: Jenny wants to switch with Clarissa to become y...

choices: Talk to Clarissa and discuss plans while you're both swapped.
1511121211221121221222211212122121212111.content:
"No, I don't want to swap." Responds Clarissa.
"Huh, why not? Don't you like being me?" Asks Jenny.
"It's not that, it's just that, if I were to swap now things wouldn't feel right. So we can't swap now, but maybe later we could."
Jenny seems annoyed by this, but reluctantly agrees to her wishes. Clarissa looks up at you and winks while no one is looking, happy to have kept your body safe.

"Alright then Kate, it's time to head home now." You tell your new daughter.
Kate shakes her head and walks over towards you prepared to leave, though at the same time she seems unhappy. Maybe you could cheer her up on the way home?
1511121211221121221222211212122121212111.title: "Sorry, but no"

1511121211221121221222211212122121212111.content:
On the way home, you tell Kate that tomorrow you will take her out and have a fun day with her. She smiles, and seems to cheer up a little, looking forward to this.
